<b>Signature:</b>


## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [maxTraceCount](./cartesian-2d.icartesian2dtraceoptions.maxtracecount.md) | number | The maximum number of vertical / horizontal trace lines (per axis). |
